name: Introduction to Musicology
description: An introduction to the field of musicology, covering its history, scope, and major topics of study.

name: Music Theory and Analysis
description: An introduction to music theory and analysis, covering topics such as harmony, form, and tonal structure.

name: Music Education
description: An introduction to the field of music education, covering topics such as pedagogy, curriculum development, and effective teaching methods.

name: Advanced Music Education
description: An advanced course in music education, covering topics such as advanced teaching methods, assessment, and trends in music education.
